text: Jean-Pierre Bel (born 30 December 1951) is a French retired politician. He was President of the Senate from 2011 to 2014."Séance du 1er octobre 2008 (compte rendu intégral des débats)", Senate website . Bel is a member of the Socialist Party. He was elected to the Senate in September 1998 and re-elected in September 2008. Bel was President of the Socialist Group in the Senate from 2004 to 2011. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Senate (France) Category:Politicians from Occitanie Category:People from Tarn
title: Jean-Pierre Bel
